movies.title: Marco: De Weg Terug
movies.plot: Once the most famous Dutch operetta singer, Marco Bakker is on his way back.
movies.simplePlot: Once the most famous Dutch operetta singer, Marco Bakker is on his way back.

biography.bio: Marco Bakker was born on March 12, 1941 in Netherlands. He is an actor, known for Theo en Thea en de ontmaskering van het tenenkaasimperium (1989), Vadertje langbeen (1964) and Jij en ikke (1965). He has been married to Willeke van Ammelrooy since November 20, 1989.
biography.name: Marco Bakker

biography.bio: Henk Poort was born on January 20, 1956 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Hendrikus Poort. He is an actor, known for Night Run (2006), The Heineken Kidnapping (2011) and Floris (2004). He has been married to Marjolein Keuning since December 26, 1993. They have two children.
biography.name: Henk Poort

biography.bio: Ernst Daniël Smid was born on May 6, 1953 in Enschede, Overijssel, Netherlands. He is an actor, known for De slimste mens ter wereld (2012), Toscaanse bruiloft (2014) and Sinterklaas & Diego: Het geheim van de ring (2014).
biography.name: Ernst Daniël Smid

biography.bio: Willeke van Ammelrooy was born on April 5, 1944 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Willy Geertje van Ammelrooij. She is an actress and director, known for The Lake House (2006), Antonia's Line (1995) and The Lift (1983). She has been married to Marco Bakker since November 20, 1989.
biography.name: Willeke van Ammelrooy
